name: dynamodb-scan-vs-query-benchmark
description: DynamoDB Scan vs Query performance benchmark using CDK

scripts.generate-products: aws lambda invoke --function-name BenchmarkStack-GenerateProductsFunction --log-type Tail /dev/stdout | jq -r '.LogResult' | base64 -d && echo
scripts.test-scan: aws lambda invoke --function-name BenchmarkStack-TestScanFunction --log-type Tail /dev/stdout | jq -r '.LogResult' | base64 -d && echo
scripts.test-query: aws lambda invoke --function-name BenchmarkStack-TestQueryFunction --log-type Tail /dev/stdout | jq -r '.LogResult' | base64 -d && echo
